name: MageSlayer (itch) (PauloZti)
description:
This game was inspired by HellTaker, you will need to push rocks into water holes to be able to walk through, break the pink energy ball so you can attack the enemy that is protected by a blue energy field. 

To complete the level you need to kill all the enemies.

You have limited actions, so think before moving. You don't need the star to complete the level, go after it if you want a little challenge.

This game is in Portuguese, but you don't need to understand what's said to be able to play, it's just funny dialogue.

Move using arrows and interact with space.

Use mouse for Menus/Retry/Pause.
